column1: Halfred was the second son of [[Gaffer Gamgee
column2: Hamfast Gamgee]]. He moved to the [[Northfarthing]].<ref>{{App

column1: The name comes from [[Old English]] ''healfrēad'' "half-red, reddish" or from ''healfrǣd'' "half counsel".<ref>[[Jim Allan]] (ed.), ''[[An Introduction to Elvish]]'', Giving of names</ref>
